name: JunoAI
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room light”
”Alexa, dim kitchen light”
”Alexa, make the bedroom light warmer”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enable Juno AI skill on Alexa to control your Juno AI lights with the Alexa app or through voice commands.
To get started, tap the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa App to link your Alexa account and say, “Alexa, discover my devices.”

The Juno AI Skill can Turn on/off lights, tune lighting color temperature from warm to cool, adjust lights brightness.

Light On/Off Controls:
- You can turn devices on/off, for example: ”Alexa, turn on Kitchen lights” or ”Alexa, turn off Living room”.
 
Light Color Temperature Controls:
- You can tune your devices light color temperature from warm to cool, for example: ”Alexa, set the Kitchen light to daylight” or ”Alexa, make the Living room warmer”.

Light Brightness Controls:
- You can change the devices brisghtness, for example: ”Alexa, set the Kitchen light to 30% ” or ”Alexa, dim the Living room”.

For more information, please go to https://juno.acuitybrands.com/juno-ai. To share your feedback, you can contact us at TechSupport-SmartConnected@acuitybrands.com
